programmes.show_description: Tá an baol ann go mbeidh sé ina chogadh dearg idir Nestor, Henao agus Yolanda. (Nestor finds himself at the edge of an impending bloody war with Colombians Henao and Yolanda.)
Craoladh ar imeachtaí na maidine de riar na hoibre i nDáil Éireann. (Coverage of today's proceedings in Dáil Éireann.)
Ceiliúradh ar amhráin a bhíodh againn ag éirí aníos. (Series which celebrates and takes a fresh look at the songs of our schooldays.)
Mórimeachtaí an lae ó Aonad Nuachta TG4. (The day's main news stories from a regional, national and international perspective.)
Is í an soprán Muirgen O'Mahony a bheidh ag caitheamh seal le Dáithí ar an gclár. (Dáithí Ó Sé will be chatting with soprano Muirgen O'Mahony on the show.)
Is é Pádraig Horan, duine de laochra móra na hiomána in Uíbh Fhailí, a bheidh faoi chaibidil sa gclár seo. (This programme focuses on Offaly hurling legend Pádraig Horan.)
Táthar fós sa tóir ar an teaghlach is cumasaí in Éirinn. (The hunt for the most talented family in Ireland.)
Cainéal nuachta 24 uair an chloig na Fraince atá i France 24. (FRANCE 24 is France's 24 hour international news channel.)
Níl aon easpa cláracha do dhaoine óga ar Cúla4 - bí ag spraoi agus ag foghlaim in éineacht linn. (Younger audiences will be spoilt for choice with Cúla4 - watch, play and learn.)
Tá a chnaipe speisialta caillte ag Clúmh. Cuireann sé an áit trí chéile agus é á chuardach. (Fluff loses his beloved Whizzy Button in the button box!)
Ná habair! Tá Cody bocht tinn! (Oh no! Cody is sick!)
Réiltín thuas sa spéir ag lonrú anuas orainn go léir. (Twinkle twinkle little star how I wonder what you are?)
Caithfidh Bróigín cúpla steip a fhoghlaim do chóisir dhamhsa Isa. (Isa's throwing a dance party and Boots has to learn to dance before they get there!)
Ag foghlaim faoi Lá an Altaithe a bheidh Elmo inniu. (Elmo is learning all about Thanksgiving today.)
Níl Pip ná Zac in ann teacht ar phlean chun Posy a sheachaint. (Pip and Zac can't agree on a plan to evade 'evil queen' Posy and capture Piggy.)
Tá na scamaill ar fad ina gcodladh. An mbeidh na hOlobobanna in ann iad a dhúiseacht le go dtosóidh sé ag sneachta? (The Olobobs discover all the snowclouds are sleeping.)
Tá Octobella ag iarraidh díoltas a bhaint amach ar Gekko. (Octobella's vendetta against Gekko builds to unseen heights.)
Faigheann Wussywat rudaí nua a cara ar iasacht ach milleann sí iad. (Wussywat borrows her friends' new things but ends up ruining them.)
Tagann ár gcairde ar ubh thréigthe agus ceapann siad gur ubh dhineasáir í. (When our friends come across an abandoned egg, they think it is a dinosaur egg.)
Tarraingíonn cluiche foghlaithe mara achrann idir Woozle agus Pip. (Woozle and Pip have an argument while playing pirates.)
Cabhraíonn Ginger agus na Piseanna-Rex le Arbharsáralófas barr an bholcáin a bhaint amach. (Ginger and the Baby Pea-Rexes help a Cornasaurolophus reach the top of a hot volcano.)
Tá Mamó Alice ag teacht ar cuairt agus tá sí ag iarraidh rud éigin deas a dhéanamh di. (Alice's grandmother is coming to stay, and she wants to do something nice for her.)
Tá Alice ag samhlú a pláinéad féin áit nach mbeidh uirthi dul a chodladh. (Alice imagines her own planet where she never has to go to bed.)
Bíonn Alice le ceangal nuair a bhíonn Emile deireanach. (Bíonn Alice le ceangal nuair a bhíonn Emile deireanach.)
Foghlaimaíonn Ray go bhfaigheann foighne fortacht. (Ray learns the importance of patience.)
Níl aon easpa cláracha do dhaoine óga ar Cúla4 - bí ag spraoi agus ag foghlaim in éineacht linn. (Younger audiences will be spoilt for choice with Cúla4 - watch, play and learn.)
Tá teas damanta ann is tá Charlie agus Lola ag iarraidh iad féin a fhuarú. (It's extremely hot, and Charlie and Lola are trying to stay cool.)
Tá Emma agus Kitt ar mhisean le leon a shábháil, ach tá faitíos orthu roimh an mbúir atá aige. (Emma and Kitt-10 need to find a way to overcome their fear of the lion's loud roar.)
Tá Lola le hagallamh a dhéanamh le hirisleabhar do pheataí. (Lola is due to be interviewed as Pet owner of the Week for a pet's magazine.)
Téann Daid chuig ceardlann 'Tuistí Tréana'. (Dad joins a 'Parent Power' workshop.)
Socraíonn Dónall agus Máirtín seó faisin a eagrú chun seanéadaí Dhónaill a dhíol. (Henry and Ralph decide to do a fashion show to sell Henry's old clothes.)
Níl aon easpa cláracha do dhaoine óga ar Cúla4 - bí ag spraoi agus ag foghlaim in éineacht linn. (Younger audiences will be spoilt for choice with Cúla4 - watch, play and learn.)
Amhrán spraíúil faoi chúig lacha bheaga. (A fun song about five little ducks.)
Téann na Blocuimhreacha ar thuras chuig monarcha torthaí inniu. (Welcome to the fabulous fun fruit factory.)
Faigheann Corcra cúnamh óna chairde chun bailchríoch a chur ar a múrphictiúr. (Purple gets lots of help from his friends as he tries to give his Mural a makeover.)
Tugann na Blociontais cúnamh d'Ealaí sruthán a thrasnú ar chlocha cora. (The Wonderblocks help Arty figure out the right directions to cross some stepping-stones.)
Tá sé in am an naíonra a ghlanadh ach tá Timmy ag iarraidh dul amach ag spraoi. (It's time to spring clean the Nursery, but Timmy just wants to go outside and play.)
Tá Síofra leis an lá a chaitheamh in éineacht lena Daideo Timín. (Síofra is going to spend the day with her Daideo Timín.)
Tá an t-uisce sa spréire ró-fhuar do Pip. (Pip finds the water from their sprinkler is too cold to play in.)
Cén fáth a mbíonn sé deacair ainmhithe áirithe a fheiceáil? (Gobnait learns that it is harder to find animals when they blend into their environment.)
Is breá le hArt lampróga ach tá sé ag cinneadh air aon cheann a fháil. (Fireflies are Art's favourite things but he is upset when he can't find any.)
Tá sé in am d'Fhéasta na dTorthaí Milse! (It's time for the Fruity Feast!)
Samhlaíonn Faith-Leigh a saol ina seacláideoir nuair a bheidh sí mór, le cúnamh ó Shióg na bPost. (Faith-Leigh imagines her life as a chocolatier when she grows up.)
Tugann Zou aire do raithneach Elzee fad a bhíonn sí ar saoire. (Zou takes care of Elzee's fern while she is on holidays.)
Tá Boris agus Sandy ag súil go dtarlóidh rud éigin iontach in Abra-Dabra. (Boris and Sandy are hoping something exciting might happen in Abra-Dabra.)
Madra ag leanúint féileacáin, rón cairdiúil agus dhá chat ag spraoi sa sneachta a bheidh againn inniu. (Today we have a dog chasing a butterfly & a friendly seal says hello.)
Patsaí Uí Chatháin a bheidh ag caint agus ag comhrá le Máirtín inniu. (Patsaí Uí Chatháin will be chatting to Máirtín today.)
Ceiliúradh ar amhráin a bhíodh againn ag éirí aníos. (Series which celebrates and takes a fresh look at the songs of our schooldays.)
Tagann na mná ar sheanphictiúr de Blanche agus de Charlie. (An old photo shows Blanche with Charlie. Sophia has a hearing test.)
Is faoi Blanche a bhíonn amhras nuair a théann na mná ar dheireadh seachtaine dúrún dúnmharaithe. (Blanche becomes the prime suspect when the girls go on a murder-mystery weekend.)
Ní go maith a théann cúrsaí pleanála do Cabot Cove nuair a thiteann bean isteach sa gcuan. (A plan to develop Cabot Cove ends badly when a woman takes a nose dive into the bay.)
I gclár deireanach na sraithe is iad na deirfiúracha ceolmhara, na Henry Girls a bheidh ar stáitse Amharclann an Ghrianáin. (The 'Henry Girls' are on stage in the final programme.)

programmes.show_name: Taste of Australia with Hayden Quinn
programmes.show_description: Téann Hayden ar thuras bóthair chun trátaí agus cáis buabhall a phiocadh suas. (Hayden heads on a road trip to pick up tomatoes and buffalo cheese.)
Clár ceoil tíre á chur i láthair ag Jo Ní Chéide. (Jo Ní Chéide showcases country music videos filmed on location here in Ireland.)
Tá Jennifer ag iarraidh an gleo a fhágáil agus bogadh go ceantar Northern Rivers. (Jennifer is fleeing a busy village and is on the search for a more rural lifestyle.)
Aimsir réigiúnach agus náisiúnta. (National and regional weather.)
Leantar cúigear feirmeoirí agus iad ag iarraidh an dúlra agus a slí bheatha a chosaint. (This series follows five farmers as they try to protect wildlife and their living.)
Clár nuachta do dhaoine óga ina gclúdaítear scéalta áitiúla, náisiúnta agus idirnáisiúnta. (News programme for young people covering local, national and international news.)
Táthar sa tóir arís ar an teaghlach is cumasaí in Éirinn! Á chur i láthair ag Síomha Ní Ruairc. (The search for Ireland's most talented family continues!)
Aimsir réigiúnach agus náisiúnta. (National and regional weather.)
Mórimeachtaí an lae ó Aonad Nuachta TG4. (The day's main news stories from a regional, national and international perspective.)
Is comórtas é Síorstíl atá bunaithe ar an bhfaisean inbhuanaithe. Tá an babhta leathcheannais buailte linn! (Semi-final time, one last chance to get to the final.)
Is é Partick Feeney meantóir na hoíche anocht ar Ghlór Tíre. Á chur i láthair ag Aoife Ní Thuairisg. (Partick Feeney is tonight's mentor on Glór Tíre.)

programmes.show_name: Síle Seoige: An Saol Mar Atá
programmes.show_description: Fiosraíonn Síle Seoige cé chomh coitianta is atá neamhoird imní in Éirinn sa lá atá inniu ann. (Síle Seoige investigates how widespread the problem of anxiety is in Ireland today.)

programmes.show_name: An Western: Man of the West
programmes.show_description: (1958, Gary Cooper) Bíonn ar iar-meirleach dul i bpáirt le buíon meirleach nuair a sháinnítear ar thraein iad. (A reformed outlaw is forced to rejoin his old outlaw band.)
Aimsir réigiúnach agus náisiúnta. (National and regional weather.)
Clár faisnéise faoi dhúnmharú triúr fear déag in Iarthar Chorcaí in 1922 in imeacht 3 oíche. (The events that led to the murder of 13 men in West Cork over 3 nights in 1922.)
Cumasc ceoil idir Seamie O'Dowd agus Daoirí Farrell, máistrí sa gceol traidisiúnta. (Seamie O'Dowd and Daoirí Farrell push the boundaries of traditional song.)
Mórimeachtaí an lae ó Aonad Nuachta TG4. (The day's main news stories from a regional, national and international perspective.)
I gclár deireanach na sraithe is iad na deirfiúracha ceolmhara, na Henry Girls a bheidh ar stáitse Amharclann an Ghrianáin. (The 'Henry Girls' are on stage in the final programme.)
Tá obair agus éachtaí go leor ar bun ag mná na hEaragaile! (We meet Aoife De Barra to find out how business has been during the summer months.)
Cén t-ábhar cainte a bhíonn ag daoine sa gcarr? Is gearr go mbeidh a fhios againn! (This is the show that reveals what people really talk about in their cars.)
Is é Séamus Ó Beaglaoich as Baile na bPoc, Corca Dhuibhne a bheidh ar an gclár seo. (Well known box player, Séamus Begley is Antaine's guest.)
Cainéal nuachta 24 uair an chloig na Fraince atá i France 24. (FRANCE 24 is France's 24 hour international news channel.)
Níl aon easpa cláracha do dhaoine óga ar Cúla4 - bí ag spraoi agus ag foghlaim in éineacht linn. (Younger audiences will be spoilt for choice with Cúla4 - watch, play and learn.)
Tá faitíos ar Dhris bocht roimh thoirneach agus tá sé ina stoirm amuigh. (Poor Dris is afraid of thunder and they are in the middle of a huge storm.)
Cuireann an tUasal Easóig spriongaí nua in Molly ach tá an iomarca preabadh acu! (Trouble comes when Weasel gives Max's little sister Molly springs that are too bouncy!)
Tá Cory faoi bhrú agus é ag iarraidh rud éigin maith a fháil le taispeáint ar scoil. (Cory feels the pressure to find something impressive for Show and Tell.)
Tá Pip ag cur mapa tóraíochta taisce i dtoll a chéile do Streak ach cén taisce a bheidh le haimsiú aige? (Pip is making a treasure hunt map for Streak.)
Tá traein lán le huibheacha ag teacht isteach sa stáisiún ach níl an traein in ann stopadh! (Roof is delivering eggs to Marwyn at the station, but the train is unable to stop.)
Tá taispeántas sleamhnán le bheith ar siúl ach tá an scáileán stróicthe. (Hero Celebration Day is capped off with a slideshow but the screen rips.)
Is aisteach an ealaín atá ar Chiarán agus ar na gasúir eile. (Ciarán and the other kids act strange and keep saying "Moon".)
Cabhraíonn Finny le Muireann taitneamh a bhaint as an lá ar scoil. (Finny helps shy little Myrtle the Turtle overcome her nerves, enjoy school, and make new friends.)
Tá an lá go breá agus is fada le Caitríona agus Roy go mbeidh siad in ann dul amach ag spraoi. (It's a beautiful day and Caitríona and Roy can't wait to go play.)
Beidh Ricky agus Tyra ag cabhrú le Daideo inniu. (Today, Ricky and Tyra help to make Grandpa's dreams come true.)
Bíonn an-spraoi ag Ricky ag dul i bhfolach ar dhaoine lena chlóca speisialta. (Ricky has fun hiding from everyone in a special cloak.)
Cé aige a bheidh an bua i gcomórtas mór an lae inniu? (Everyone is trying their best to win the lava competition, but who will win?)
Tá Harmony, Melody agus Bop ar an bhfeirm ag éisteacht leis na hainmhithe ar fad ag gleo. (Harmony, Melody and Bop try to guess which animals make all the noises on the farm.)
Is iomaí píosa spraoi a bhíonn ag páirc aonaigh. (There are lots of fun things to do at a fairground.)
Níl aon easpa cláracha do dhaoine óga ar Cúla4 - bí ag spraoi agus ag foghlaim in éineacht linn. (Younger audiences will be spoilt for choice with Cúla4 - watch, play and learn.)
Foghlaimeoidh Nic agus Sailí faoi champáil ó Minnie an míorchat. (Minnie the Meerkat teaches Nick and Sally about safe camping.)
Tá Nic agus Sailí ag iarraidh duilleoga a bhailiú. (The Cat takes Nick and Sally to Kaloo-Kalee to search for leaves for their leaf collage.)
Tá Nic agus Sailí ag iarraidh stíl nua gruaige. Tugann siad cuairt ar chairde Chait le comhairle a fháil. (Nick and Sally want new hairstyles.)
Níl aon leac oighir fanta ag Nic ná ag Sailí. Tugann an Cat chuig Bróna, an béar bán, iad. (Nick & Sally run out of ice and go to visit Polly the polar bear who knows all about ice.)
Tá Nic agus Sailí ag iarraidh déanamh amach céard a bheidh Pugail a dhéanamh nuair a bheidh sí mór. (The Cat, Nick & Sally meet Puggle and guess what she'll be when she grows up.)
Socraíonn Zak cúpla cleas a imirt ar na múinteoirí ionaid. (Zak thinks up plenty of pranks to play on the substitute teachers.)
Rachaidh Zak agus a chairde chuig meaisín a bhfuil fear feasa istigh ann. (Zak and his friends get their fortunes told by a vending machine.)
Tá Shani idir dhá chomhairle faoi dhul chuig an gcoláiste eolaíochta nó scoil na dtaibhealaíona. (Shani struggles to choose between science college or the performing arts school.)
Tá Polly ag ceapadh go bhfuil a fhios aici cén peata is fearr a d'fheileadh a comharsa chantalach. (Polly thinks she knows exactly the right pet for her grumpy neighbour.)
Buaicphointí CLG ó na cluichí i Sraitheanna Allianz. (Highlights of the weekend's best GAA action from the Allianz Leagues.)
An tseachtain seo: An Tearmann V Baile na nGallóglach. (This week: Termon V Millford.)
Craoaldh beo ó Johannesburg ar an gcluiche idir na Sharks agus na Lions sa gCraobh Rugbaí Aontaithe. (Live coverage  of the Sharks v the Lions in the United Rugby Championship.)
Tá athrú tagtha ar an gcomórtas agus buaileann na hiomaitheoirí ar fad le chéile ar an trá chéanna. (The game is about to change when castaways come together on the same beach.)
Ceol anocht ó Sharon Shannon, Karen Tweed & Maria Kalaniemi. (Featuring Sharon Shannon, Karen Tweed & Maria Kalaniemi from Finland. Presented by box player Mary Staunton.)
Aimsir réigiúnach agus náisiúnta. (National and regional weather.)
Craoladh beo ar an gcluiche idir Gaillimh agus Ard Mhacha i mbabhta 4 de Shraith Lidl. (Live coverage of Galway v Armagh in round 4 of the Lidl League.)

programmes.show_name: Plant the Planet - GAA in Uganda
programmes.show_description: Clár faisnéise ina bhfeictear mar a thugann an spórt daoine le chéile ar fud an domhain. (A captivating documentary where we witness how sport unites cultures worldwide.)
Aimsir réigiúnach agus náisiúnta. (National and regional weather.)
Mórimeachtaí an lae ó Aonad Nuachta TG4. (The day's main news stories from a regional, national and international perspective.)
Craoladh beo ar an gcluiche idir Áth Cliath agus Ciarraí i mbabhta 4 de Shraith Peile Allianz. (Live coverage of Dublin v Kerry in round 4 of the Allianz Football League.)
Is í Evanne Ní Chuilinn a bheidh ag caint le hÁine Ní Bhreisleáin sa gclár seo. (Evanne Ní Chuilinn gives Áine Ní Bhreisleáin an insight into her life.)
Osclaíonn Danny Flynn club dornálaíochta le súil athmhuintearas a chothú i mBéal Feirste. (Danny Flynn re-opens a boxing ring in effort to heal his Belfast community.)
Aimsir réigiúnach agus náisiúnta. (National and regional weather.)
Deis eile na trí chlár seo, a rinneadh mar chuid den chomóradh céad bliain ar Éirí Amach 1916, a fheiceáil. (Another chance to see TG4's flagship project to mark the centenary of the Easter Rising.)
